casinogames

Class CasinoGamesBlackJackModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • casinogames.CasinoGamesBlackJackModel

  • public class CasinoGamesBlackJackModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Logic Model for Black Jack. Contains all of the necessary rules to play the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CasinoGamesBlackJackModel(int n)
      Default Constructor for Blackjack.

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Sets the turn to player 1 and deals everyone 2 cards.

      • hit

        public void hit()
        Method for when a player hits. Draws them a card.

      • stand

        public void stand()
        Method for when a player stands. Changes the turn player.

      • getTurnPlayer

        public int getTurnPlayer()
        Gets whose turn it is.
        Returns:
        Integer value that is index of the turn player in playerList.

      • getHandValue

        public int getHandValue(Player player)
        Returns the numerical value of a player's hand.
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose hand is being checked.
        Returns:
        Returns the value of the player's hand.

      • isBlackJack

        public boolean isBlackJack(Player player)
        Checks if the player has a BlackJack and returns a boolean.
        Parameters:
        player - The player (dealer included) whose hand is being checked for a blackjack.
        Returns:
        true if the player has a black jack; false if the player does not have a black jack.

      • isBust

        public boolean isBust(Player player)
        Checks if the current player's (dealer included) hand is a bust.
        Parameters:
        player - The player's whose hand is being checked.
        Returns:
        True of the player's hand is a bust. False otherwise.

      • dealerWon

        public boolean dealerWon(Player player,
                         Player dealer)
        Checks if the dealer won.
        Parameters:
        player - The player going against the dealer.
        dealer - The dealer.
        Returns:
        True if the Dealer Won, False otherwise.

      • isDraw

        public boolean isDraw(Player player,
                      Player dealer)
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose hand is being compared to the dealer.
        dealer - The Dealer.
        Returns:
        True if the hand is a tie; false otherwise.

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer(int i)
        Get Method for a particular player so the GUI can access things such as the player's hand.
        Parameters:
        i - The index of the player in playerList. The dealer is at index 0.
        Returns:
        The player at index i.

      • gameReset

        public void gameReset()
        Empties both the player's and dealer's hands.
